00089 std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> uvm_get_children (sc_core::sc_module * pmod) {
00090   std::vector<sc_object*> child_obj_vec;
00091   std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> child_mod_vec;
00092   sc_core::sc_module *pchild;
00093 
00094   child_obj_vec = pmod->get_child_objects();
00095 
00096   for (int i = 0; i < child_obj_vec.size(); i++)
00097   {
00098     pchild = DCAST<sc_core::sc_module*>(child_obj_vec[i]);
00099     if (pchild != NULL)
00100       child_mod_vec.push_back(pchild);
00101   }
00102   return child_mod_vec;
00103 
00104 }

00124 std::string uvm_glob_to_regex(const std::string &glob)
00125 {
00126     uvmsc_boost::regex re("(\\*)|(\\?)|([[:blank:]])|(\\.|\\+|\\^|\\$|\\[|\\]|\\(|\\)|\\{|\\}|\\\\)");
00127     //const char*        format = "(?1\\\\w+)(?2\\.)(?3\\\\s*)(?4\\\\$&)";
00128     //const char*        format = "(?1\\\.*)(?2\\.)(?3\\\\s*)(?4\\\\$&)";
00129     const char*        format = "(?1\\.*)(?2\\.)(?3\\\\s*)(?4\\\\$&)";
00130     //const char*        format = "(?1\\\\.*)(?2\\.)(?3\\\\s*)(?4\\\\$&)";
00131     std::stringstream  final;
00132     int                length;
00133 
00134     length = glob.length();
00135     if (length == 0)
00136     {
00137         final << "/0";
00138     }
00139     // already a regular expression
00140     else if ((glob.substr(0, 1).compare(uvm_regex_encap) == 0) && 
00141              (glob.substr(length - 1, 1).compare(uvm_regex_encap) == 0))
00142     {
00143         final << glob;
00144     }
00145     else
00146     {
00147         //final << uvm_regex_encap;
00148         std::ostream_iterator<char, char> oi(final);
00149         uvmsc_boost::regex_replace(oi, glob.begin(), glob.end(), re, format, uvmsc_boost::match_default | uvmsc_boost::format_all);
00150         //final << uvm_regex_encap;
00151     }
00152 
00153     return final.str();
00154 }

00175 
00176 void uvm_register_config_callback(uvm_component *comp)
00177 {
00178     if (uvm_config_callback_vec == NULL)
00179         uvm_config_callback_vec = new std::vector<uvm::uvm_component *>;
00180 
00181     uvm_config_callback_vec->push_back(comp);
00182 }
00183 
00184 void uvm_unregister_config_callback(uvm_component *comp)
00185 {
00186     if (uvm_config_callback_vec == NULL)
00187         cout << "ERROR: uvm_unregister_config_callback - vector is empty" << endl;
00188 
00189     uvm_config_callback_vec->erase( std::remove( uvm_config_callback_vec->begin(), uvm_config_callback_vec->end(), comp ), uvm_config_callback_vec->end() ); 
00190 
00191     if (uvm_config_callback_vec->size() == 0)
00192         delete uvm_config_callback_vec;
00193 
00194 }
00195 
00196 void uvm_config_callback(std::string cntxt, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc)
00197 {
00198 
00199     for (int i = 0; i < uvm_config_callback_vec->size(); i++)
00200     {
00201         (*uvm_config_callback_vec)[i]->config_callback(cntxt, inst_name, field_name, rsrc);
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00205 void uvm_register_rsrc_callback(uvm_component *comp)
00206 {
00207     uvm_rsrc_callback_vec.push_back(comp);
00208 }
00209 
00210 void uvm_rsrc_callback(uvm_rsrc_action action, std::string scope, std::string name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc)
00211 {
00212     for (int i = 0; i < uvm_rsrc_callback_vec.size(); i++)
00213     {
00214         uvm_rsrc_callback_vec[i]->rsrc_callback(action, scope, name, rsrc);
00215     }
00216 }
